summary: A group of amateur paranormal investigators enter an abandoned insane asylum to discover if the stories they have heard are actually true.
cast: Michel Chauvet|Anna Cetti|Mario Escalante|Juan Luis Tovar|José Alberto Arroyo Guerra|Manú Charrittón|Edna Gabriela Delgadillo Pérez|Mario Ángel Velázquez Rodríguez|Martin Sergio Carrillo González
title: Archivo 253
